ygData.subject: Re: problem with flash site
ygData.msgSnippet: Never mind...  A lesson in making sure you check everything before posting to a group.  There was a robots meta-tag set to nofollow on the page. Rob.

Never mind...  A lesson in making sure you check everything before
posting to a group.  There was a robots meta-tag set to nofollow on
the page.

Rob.


--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, "robeger" <reger@a...> wrote:
> I'm trying to crawl http://www.orcun.de which as far as I can tell is
> completely flash-based.  I can't seem to get Heritrix to follow
> through the links in the flash though.  It stops after crawling the
> opening page, and won't download the swf file.  There is no
> robots.txt, so it's not a restriction set there.
> 
> Any ideas?
> 
> Thanks,
> Rob Eger
> Local Matters, Inc.
